channel.title: Possible to switch to 508 client from 474?
channel.description:
I've been developing my server for a weekish now, and it popped into my head... Can I have users switch between graphic styles? How so? Would I have to use different caches? Clients? obviously. But can anyone go about explaining the method?
Any help is much appreciated.

item.title: Possible to switch to 508 client from 474?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m sure it’s possible but you would probably have to

a) have the client reload using an alternate cache
b) realize the amount of space that would take cache wise

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to switch to 508 client from 474?
